title: Canvas Fundamentals
overview: Learn how to draw efficiently and predictably using immediate mode rendering.

sections.title: Immediate Mode
sections.content:
Canvas uses **Immediate Mode** rendering. It has no memory of objects. You must redraw the entire scene every frame.

**Coordinates**:
- Origin (0,0) is Top-Left
- X is Right
- Y is Down

sections.title: Moving Object
sections.content: Update an `x` variable by `speed * dt`, and use `ctx.fillRect(x, ...)` to draw it. Don't forget `ctx.clearRect`!

questions.question: What happens if you forget `ctx.clearRect`?
questions.explanation: Since pixel data persists until overwritten, failing to clear results in trails of old drawings.

questions.question: Where is (0,0) on a Canvas?
questions.explanation: The web coordinate system starts at the top-left corner.

miniProject.title: Bouncing Box
miniProject.description: Create a box that bounces off the edges of the canvas.
